document.title: Attestation Tool
document.intro: The Attestation Tool is a multi purpose GUI used in the production of computational lexica and gold standard data for NE tagging. It addresses the situation of having a comprehensive dictionary consisting of headwords (lemmata) and corresponding quotations in which occurrences of the he...
